title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires a definite integral with a correct integrand.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires a definite integral with a difference of squares for the integrand.

The second point requires both terms of the integrand.

At most 1 out of 2 integrand points earned if there is one error in the integrand OR a reversal of terms.

A response that imports incorrect limits from part (a) is eligible for all points.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires an integrand in terms of y MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9Lq pC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaa biGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadMhaaaa@3749@ that addresses the length of either side of the rectangular cross section.

The second point requires the integrand to represent the cross sectional area.

At most 1 out of 2 integrand points earned if there is one error in the integrand.

A response is eligible for all points if the limits are consistent with the x-values from part (a).

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.
